thread.title: Sun Capital Cashes In Again on Manufacturing With Robertshaw Sale

author: Laura Kreutzer
title: Sun Capital Cashes In Again on Manufacturing With Robertshaw Sale

organizations.name: robertshaw sale sun capital partners inc.

text:
Sun Capital Partners Inc., a private-equity firm known for its ownership of brand-name retailers and restaurant chains, is cashing in on industrial manufacturing deals.
Boca Raton, Fla.-based Sun has agreed to sell three manufacturing companies in the past two weeks, which a person familiar with the firm said have a total combined enterprise value of $3.5 billion.
It...
